duties_responsibilities.duty: Implement new and enhance existing functionality on Client.com and related applications for Field Service, Service Contracts, Technical Support, and Customer Support.
Engage with the existing SFDC Center of Excellence to represent projects and enhance the Service Organization.
Work with SFDC Architects to implement SFDC Service functionality.
Interface on a day-to-day basis with business users, super users, and IT team members to support business operations and drive change management.
Lead cross-functional meetings for requirements gathering, project management, and status updates.

education_certification.credential: Bachelor's degree in Business Administration, Information Systems, or related field (Master's preferred)
